body.name: KLIM Blaze X RGB + New Version 2024 + Rechargeable Wireless Gaming Mouse with Charging Dock + Long-Lasting Battery + Up to 12000 DPI + Wired & Wireless Mouse PC, PS5, PS4, Mac + White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 1 min
features: ✅ COMPLETE FREEDOM TO DOMINATE THE GAME. Enjoy the advantages of a wireless mouse and stop worrying about cables. The KLIM Blaze X features excellent reaction time and responsiveness, comparable to any high-end wired computer mouse. Your movements are always perfectly tracked thanks to its precise sensor, so you can get an edge in your games!

✅ ENJOY GREAT ERGONOMICS. Ideal mouse handling greatly depends on the shape, size, and weight of the mouse, ensuring perfect control in all types of movement. It's a great match for any grip style you use (palm, claw or fingertip). Bonus: To be even more accurate, you can use the additional grip tape with the mouse which is provided in the box.

✅ GAMING IN STYLE. This mouse is not only a joy to play with, it's also a joy to behold. Its matte finish contrasts with the bright RGB curves and transparent bottom part of the mouse. Customize the effects, colour and brightness using our dedicated drivers. You can even select specific colors for the logo depending on the current DPI value of the mouse... the choice is yours!

✅ BUILT TO LAST + A RISK-FREE PURCHASE. Each button on this mouse has been tested to withstand more than 80 million clicks. Its durable coating provides increased resistance against wear and tear. Blaze X is also covered by a 5 years coverage, which is a testament to the quality of the mouse. And should you encounter any issue, our dedicated customer support team is at your service 24/7!

✅ BUILT-IN BATTERY + CHARGING DOCK. Unlike other models using disposable batteries, we have included a long-lasting built-in battery that can be charged over and over again with minimal degradation. Just place it on the charging dock and you'll have your wireless mouse always ready for action. It's also the smart choice: you will save a lot of money in disposable batteries!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How long does the battery last? It depends on the use intensity, the mode and the RGB effect brightness and ranges from 18 to 60 hours (about 5-7 days of normal use) and even reach 150 hours in Bluetooth mode (about 28 days). How does the charging dock work? Connect the dock to your computer using the provided cable and then insert the USB receiver to the dock's frontal port (or directly to your computer if you prefer). To charge the mouse, simply place it on the dock until it snaps into position. Can the RGB / buttons be customized? Yes, you can download a customization software in our website (Windows only) to rebind the buttons, change the mouse settings, customize the RGB colors and effects, and set up useful macros. The mouse switches off automatically, is that normal? Yes, the mouse enters sleep mode after a short period of inactivity to save battery. To reactivate it, simply press any button. Can it be used while charging? Yes, just unplug the cable from the back port of the dock and connect it directly to your mouse to continue working or playing in wired mode.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THE BEST overall mouse at this price point
reviews.reviewText: Let me start off by saying that I've never written any review anywhere near this detailed for any product. Anyway,When I purchased this mouse for use at my job, I got it because it had great reviews, subtle RGB, a mostly normal-looking overall design, wireless connectivity, and no normal batteries. I did not expect a particularly high build quality, any sort of decent packaging, or really anything that was above any old standard mouse, I just really wanted a wireless RGB mouse that wasn't designed with the most ridiculous overly angular design.What I got was so much more. Immediately upon seeing the box, I'm noticing the high-quality cardboard construction, the velcro open and close tab, the custom-fit foam for every piece, the extensive and perfectly English (as well as several other languages) user's manual, and.... well, there's an envelope inside that I won't spoil, because the WOW factor on it was just nothing I've ever experienced with any other product. Hint: this mouse was created by a dedicated and closely-knit team who cares about what they do.But then it's time for the mouse. I plug in the USB receiver into the PC, switch on the mouse, and... it just works. It works perfectly. All the RGB lights come on with a perfectly fluid RGB change, the mouse sits well in your hand, it's light, the scroll wheel is HEAVENLY and notchy (better than my G502 ever will be), the clicking feels firm and everything is just so well put together. It easily magnetizes to the wireless dock, which I hadn't even previously realized came with RGB on it. The mouse's lights change to green to indicate that it's charging, and change back to RGB once charged adequately. I was so excited at work that I attracted the attention of a coworker who immediately noticed the mouse, read the contents of the envelope, and, no joke, bought the mouse IMMEDIATELY. There was no hesitation and he was just as blown away as I was at the sheer quality of the mouse.Mice that are priced at one hundred dollars more have little going for them above this mouse, besides maybe a years-proven reliability and maybe a couple extra buttons I've never even used. But for a vast majority of purposes, this mouse is going to be the best buy you can get, really. It's just so affordable and amazing. I wouldn't be surprised if the mouse rises in price as more and more orders come in, but it's worth it. At this point I should just work for their marketing team because I've spent more effort selling this mouse to strangers than I do anywhere else. Thank you KLIM

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not a bad mouse!
reviews.reviewText: I experienced some delay when I was using it in wireless mode so I switched to wired and it works great. The mouse is light and pretty durable. It’s a great budget gaming mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Riser stickers inhibit functionality
reviews.reviewText: Got the mouse—fantastic packaging by the way— and one of the first things I do is put on the grip stickers and the what I assume to be “smoother” surface stickers for the bottom. The grip stickers are very very nice, but I noticed some functionality issues where the mouse would suddenly just stop moving for a short period of time. I thought I was going crazy. Was it the battery? Was it the driver?No, turns out the sensor on the bottom of the mouse has a VERY short range (good for gaming! No accidental movement other than when the mouse is on the pad) but it’s in fact SO short that just adding the small risers for smoother motion sometimes caused the mouse to not register some movements. Took off the stickers, and the mouse worked like a charm.Other notes: clicking is very very satisfying, build quality is excellent for the price, the subtle RGB is super clean and I dig it a lot, and the charging holder holds the mouse well.Excellent product, but the stickers for the bottom of the mouse seem like a bit of a mechanical oversight, as they detract from the functionality of the mouse. Why include them?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feature Packed @Bargain Prices
reviews.reviewText: It's a Pretty Good deal for the Pricepoint (35USD at the time of purchase) heck even if it was 50 bucks i'd still think it was a Great buy.Ergonomics feel Good (i have a claw gripe style of holding a mouse)RGB is a nice plus but not a NecessityThe Response time is Great, I play alot of DOTA 2 (MMORPG) and you can die in the game under 2seconds so timing is Critical, so far it works well no issues for my unit.The Magnetic charging Base is such a WIN along with the ability to USB-C charge this device. :Doverall a Great Buy i am Pretty Satisfied with the Product.

reviews.reviewText: Great mouse for gaming. Excellent product. They give you extras like grip tape and extra Teflon feet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love it. The colors are amazing. And i love the way it recharges. It works amazing. And is comfortable in your hand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better than expensive mice
reviews.reviewText: 4 out of 5 simple because I would love if the mouse would just have silent clicks. Otherwise it’s a 5 of 5. Not a bad review on product as it’s perfect compared to a mouse that’s 100$+. It comes with stickers and a bunch of grip tape stickers that are optional to add. Better than most mice.

Respuesta muy rápido modificación de colores muy buena y en respuesta del ratón rápida y es muy ligero enBatería muy buena si dejas en colores distintos con sumeMucha batería lo mejor en un color

reviews.reviewTitle: Souris légère qui fait le job
reviews.reviewText: J'ai acheté cette souris en remplacement de ma souris Logitech sans fil qui commençait à fatiguer.Le réglage des DPI via le bouton sur le dessus de la souris impeccable, en revanche l'installation du pilote pour gérer les fonctionnalité de la souris, n'est pas fonctionnel, je m'explique, le paramètre de la souris dans le logiciel ( réglage type de couleur, réglage dpi,.. ) n'a aucun effet sur la souris, après redémarrage de la souris aucun changement n'est apporté, bug dans le programme ??? Sinon à part ça, elle fonctionne très bien.
